poetry.value: <Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n图书一室。香暖垂帘密。花满翠壶熏研席。睡觉满窗晴日。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='手寒不了残棋。篝香细勘唐碑。无酒无诗情绪，欲梅欲雪天时。\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n青海长云暗雪山，孤城遥望玉门关。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='黄沙百战穿金甲，不破楼兰终不还。\n'>

name.value: <Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/p[1]/a/b/text()' data='水龙吟·露寒烟冷蒹葭老'>

poetry.value: <Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n露寒烟冷蒹葭老，天外征鸿寥唳。银河秋晚，长门灯悄，一声初至。应念潇湘，岸遥人静'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='须信衡阳万里，有谁家、锦书遥寄。万重云外，斜行横阵，才疏又缀。仙掌月明，石头城下'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n瘦玉萧萧伊水头，风宜清夜露宜秋。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='更教仙骥旁边立，尽是人间第一流。\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n营州少年厌原野，狐裘蒙茸猎城下。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='虏酒千钟不醉人，胡儿十岁能骑马。\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n弊庐隔尘喧，惟先养恬素。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='卜邻近三径，植果盈千树。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='粤余任推迁，三十犹未遇。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='书剑时将晚，丘园日已暮。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='晨兴自多怀，昼坐常寡悟。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='冲天羡鸿鹄，争食羞鸡鹜。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='望断金马门，劳歌采樵路。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='乡曲无知己，朝端乏亲故。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='谁能为扬雄，一荐甘泉赋。\n'>

name.value: <Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/p[1]/a/b/text()' data='少年游·玉肌铅粉傲秋霜'>

poetry.value: <Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n对酒寂不语，怅然悲送君。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='明时未得用，白首徒攻文。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='泽国从一官，沧波几千里。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='群公满天阙，独去过淮水。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='旧家富春渚，尝忆卧江楼。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='自闻君欲行，频望南徐州。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='穷巷独闭门，寒灯静深屋。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='北风吹微雪，抱被肯同宿。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='君行到京口，正是桃花时。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='舟中饶孤兴，湖上多新诗。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='潜虬且深蟠，黄鹄举未晚。'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='惜君青云器，努力加餐饭。\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
<Selector xpath='div[@class="cont"]/div[@class="contson"]/text()' data='\n'>
